_comment: Edit this file to customize your job search. No code changes needed. Run 'openjob setup' to configure interactively.
_sort_by_comment: DD = most recent first. R = most relevant.
_max_days_old_comment: Only show jobs posted within this many days. 0 = no limit.
_max_candidates_comment: Max job cards to collect per scrape attempt.

fallback._comment: Fallback stages run when target count is not met. Leave empty to disable.

primary._comment: Your primary job target. Add more categories (secondary, etc.) if needed.

_max_candidates_preview_comment: Max candidates for 'openjob scrape' preview. Smaller = faster.
